alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; South Central Duval; Trout River (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 4:13PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN DUVAL COUNTY THROUGH 500 PM EDT... At 413 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Normandy, or near Jacksonville, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph, pea size hail, and excessive cloud-to-ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Excessive cloud-to-ground lightning is occurring. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Unf, Arlington, Baymeadows, Ortega, Craig Field, Fort Caroline, Nas Jax, Normandy, and San Marco. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; South Central Duval; Trout River
